phrases: The battle with Grimoire Heart continues on the guild's sacred ground, Tenroujima.
the rest of us are in desperate battles with the Lost Magic using 7 Kin of Purgatory!
Furthermore, it is looking like the second in command, Bluenote, is drawing near...
During all this, a woman the spitting image of Ul appeared in front of me...
Juvia and Gray-sama were enemies when they first met,
however fickle fate drew them near!
Juvia chased after Gray-sama and fought together with him at the Tower of Heaven,
One day, she will be linked for eternity with Gray-sama...
Juvia, Gray, and my senses are all linked together.
Now, no matter which one of us dies, Gray will die.
That means that you would die as well!
The three of us can do nothing but die.
Someone is senses are flowing into me.
Is this what is doing it?
When did I get stuck with it?
I am going to lose sight of them because of this!
Something seems to be pressing against my back?
He is leaning his back against something.
Now that I am linked with Gray, I have no need to fight anyone, anymore!
All I need to do is kill myself.
I am not afraid of death!
Maguilty sense will link the pain, but it cannot link the injury itself...
The only way to stop me is to kill me!
But the one special exception to this magic is that death itself is linked.
The lives of those that have been linked are one.
And yet, you still plan on fighting it?!
The only path we three have left is to die...
All three of us can live!
Even when defeating our opponents, Fairy Tail wizards do not take their lives!
I am going to kill Gray for Ultear's sake!
Not as long as Juvia is here!
You will be out of commission soon enough!
We were ordered to wipe out all the people in the land where Zeref's key is sleeping.
This girl can get close to the depths of magic.
Ul, why do you always seem lonely?
I told you, do not call me Ul.
I will tell you about it, one day.
I do not need such a big girl as my daughter.
You have people precious to you, too!
It is not just our senses that are linked, but our emotions, too?
Juvia will live for the people she loves!
If you have love, you have got to keep on living!
If I link my emotions any more with this woman...
The tears of love and vigor...
Gray-sama will never run, nor hide.
The senses that were connected to me have disappeared.
As well as the mark on my arm.
I am Ultear, the daughter of your teacher, Ul.
She and Jellal betrayed the Magic Council, and actually belonged to Grimoire Heart!
I bet you hate my guts, do not you?
I have wanted to see you for so long...
I am on your side, see.
You have some for me, too?
If you would like, shall I assist you?
The rain is not stopping, is it?
I hope Carla and Lily are okay...
We found our camp along the way.
Gajeel and Mira are in critical condition.
Lily said he was stopping there.
I hope they are all okay.
Heart's ship is beyond there, by the eastern shore.
Hey, do you think we should head there?
Cana might be there as well.
I think it would be for the best for us all to join together.
We will do something about Grimoire Heart and Zeref, do not worry.
Just stop them from attacking the island, please!
Fine, then buy us some time, at least.
No, that is not what I meant!
I want to know exactly how you are going to manage to overcome this!
You do not have to say it.
Ul's death was not your fault.
My mother was only protecting her pupils.
I think of it with pride.
I do not really care what you think of me.
But I cannot think Ul would be proud of what you are doing!
Deliora was the reason that Ul gave up her life!
And it was Zeref who created that thing, right?!
You guys are going to use Zeref to create some nutty world that makes no sense!
What I am trying to do is what my mother...
I never imagined that over half of the 7 Kin of Purgatory would be cut down.
He is the only one I did not want to use...
Natsu and the others are coming here?
Unless something has happened, Carla should be leading them here.
We have a lot of injured here.
If we were attacked by the enemy, we would be in trouble!
They should also be bringing the wounded Master here.
We are never going to give up!
As long as we all work together, I am sure...
In this world we live in,
there is something called an insurmountable difference in strength.
My fragment... it is shaking in excitement...
Devouring all the fairies, not leaving a single one left!
Can I support myself in battle mode?
We have all reached the limits of our magic power!
Hurry up and get here, Natsu!
I am worried about Cana as well.
I hope she is at the camp.
Why is it raining so hard only near him?!
There is a monster even worse than him?!
Great, the annoying one has arrived.
Going to interrupt my meal, are we?
This war is over, I suppose.
This island will be left lifeless.
I do not really care about Fairy Tail, or Zeref...
But there is one thing here that I want.
Where is the grave of Fairy Tail's founding Master, Mavis Vermilion?
I can finally become S class!
I can finally meet my father!
Natsu, I need to tell you something.
You see, I have a secret that I have never told you, Natsu.
Promise me you will not get mad?
You really will not get mad?
Hurry up and spit it out!
Next time: The Words Could not Say.
That is'because you would not say it.
It is a secret because it is something I cannot tell people!
Then why did you bring it up in the first place?
